name: Tuna Buns in Tinfoil
author: Lois
summary: This dish is great for those nights you are looking for something easy to cook. Tuna, green olives, sweet pickles, and green pepper combined with American cheese and mayonnaise then baked in buttered hamburger buns.
ingredients: ¼ pound processed American cheese, cubed
1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
directions: Place egg in a saucepan and cover with cold water
Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat
Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes
Remove from hot water, cool, peel and chop
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
In a mixing bowl, combine the American cheese, mayonnaise, chopped egg and tuna
Then mix in the green pepper, onion, chopped sweet pickles, and the chopped olives
Butter the hamburger buns with about a 1/2 tablespoon for each
Fill the buns with the mixture and wrap in tinfoil
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until cheese is melted
